Module com.ning.breakout
Package com.ning.breakout.view.graphics

Class RubberBall

java.lang.Object
com.ning.breakout.view.graphics.Ball
com.ning.breakout.view.graphics.RubberBall
All Implemented Interfaces:
Movable
public class RubberBall extends Ball
RubberBall is the concrete class extends from the abstract class Ball, with radius of 5.
Author:
Ning ZHU - modified

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    RubberBall(javafx.geometry.Point2D center, javafx.scene.Group container)
    The class constructor sets the model of the rubber ball, binds the layout of the view of the rubber ball with the model and adds the view to the container by calling the constructor of super class.

  • Constructor Details

    • RubberBall

      public RubberBall(javafx.geometry.Point2D center, javafx.scene.Group container)
      The class constructor sets the model of the rubber ball, binds the layout of the view of the rubber ball with the model and adds the view to the container by calling the constructor of super class.
      Parameters:
      center - the center point of the rubber ball
      container - the container of rubber ball's view
